verbose_text: Yang et al found that genetic or pharmacological inhibition of TLR4 promoted the formation of a local immunosuppressive microenvironment and attenuated autophagy associated degradation of collagen and cell death in the fibrotic lung tissues, and thus led to pulmonary inflammation, fibrosis, and dysfunction induced by bleomycin being aggravated, which eventually caused the death of the experimental animals.
evidence: TLR4 promoted the formation of a local immunosuppressive microenvironment and attenuated autophagy
